test.projects.Maestro.src.gwt.com.maestroreading.client.messagebus
Class MessageBus

java.lang.Object
  test.projects.Maestro.src.gwt.com.maestroreading.client.messagebus.MessageBus

class MessageBus

MessageBus.java - The MessageBus class provides a central message sending service to allow modules to communicate. This class uses the standard GoF Observer pattern to allow classes implementing MessageHandler to register to receive types of messages. This allows the various panels and modules to be completely decoupled The MessageBus is a Singleton Message types should be of the 'event' type. Making this an event driven messaging system

author:
Scott Burch
version:
1.0, May 2008
